description:
Paired with beautiful, outgoing gyaru Watanabe Akari for his high school marriage practical course, introverted Yakuin Jiro agrees to act the perfect couple so that they can score high enough to switch partners and be placed with their crushes.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Living in the Same Place, but Not Living Together.
Plus qu`une cohabitation, mais pas un concubinage.
同居以上, 同棲未満.
